description: Try our easy to follow Easy Pepperoni Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Pepperoni Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and golden and base is crisp. Serve scattered with basil leaves if you like.
